title: Powless, Quinn to Attack as EF Education-EasyPost Pivots to Tour de France Stage-Hunting Mode
content:
With GC captain Carapaz on the mend, riders like Neilson Powless and Sean Quinn will have freedom to move: 'I'm going with high ambitions and big goals.'

Read the full article at Powless, Quinn to Attack as EF Education-EasyPost Pivots to Tour de France Stage-Hunting Mode on Velo.
author: ahood
